document_data.name: Old Stump
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Old Stump''' was an expensive, but high quality, inn found within the town of [[Velarsburg]] in [[Harrowdale]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Despite its price, it attracted outlanders who came to town shopping for furniture and other wooden crafts. It was known for its warm, caring atmosphere and good home-style cooking.

{{Stub-geo}}
